content.text: Hi, I'm a barista at a coffee shop in Ann Arbor.
Hi, I'm a student at Michigan State University.
I'm majoring in English and minoring in education.
Oh cool, I'm just a general studies student right now.
What do you want to do with your life?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about playing music for a living.
That's awesome! I always wanted to learn how to play an instrument.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm really into indie rock right now.
Me too! I love bands like The Shins and Death Cab for Cutie.
I love those bands too! I also like Modest Mouse and The National.
Oh yeah, I love Modest Mouse! I haven't really listened to The National much, but I've heard good things about them.
You should definitely check them out! They're one of my favorite bands.
I will, thanks for the recommendation.
